actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to establish programs to improve the health and safety of children receiving child care outside the home, and for other purposes.
short_title: Children's Day Care Health and Safety Improvement Act
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: Children's Day Care Health and Safety Improvement Act - Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make allotments to States and territories to enable them to establish programs to improve the health and safety of children receiving child care outside the home by preventing illnesses and injuries associated with such care and promoting the health and well-being of such children. Sets forth an allotment formula.Requires States to submit applications to the Secretary in order to be eligible for an allotment. Describes activities to be carried out by States through the use of such allotments.

titles.title: Children's Day Care Health and Safety Improvement Act
A bill to establish programs to improve the health and safety of children receiving child care outside the home, and for other purposes.
